revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: " Nekpheros, son of Ischyrion, 8 dr. with addition,;Papontos, son of Nekpheros, 4 dr.,;Orsenouphis, son of Amos, 4 dr. with addition,;Panetbyis, son of Hermias, 28 dr.,;Peteus, son of Nekpheros, son of Harouthmeus, 4 dr.,;352;Peros, son of Sambas, 4 dr.,;Nekpheros, son of Pouonis, 4 dr.,;Pakous, son of the younger Onnophris, 4 dr.,;Mysthas, son of Nekpheros Tim.e(), 8 dr.,;Petosiris, son of Panekas, 8 dr.,;Ischyrion, son of Petethas, 44 dr.,;Petesouchos, son of Arkos, son of Pnepheros, 40 dr.,;Hesties, likewise, the younger, 8 dr., ;Hesties, likewise, . . ., 4 dr.,;Hesties, likewise, 24 dr.,;Pnepheros, likewise, son of Ker(), 12 dr. with addition,;Petosiris, son of Petermouthios, son of Kyt(), 8 dr.,;Panetbys, son of Horion, son of Philon, 4 dr. with addition,;Ammonis, likewise, son of the older Kyr(), 28 dr.,;Petermouthis, son of Mysthos, 8 dr. with addition,;208, ;14, Horos, son of Geos the shepherd, 12 dr.,;Horion, son of Ptolemaios, son of Psois, 4 dr.,;Archonas, son of Petosiris, son of Hegoumenos, 4 dr.,;Pakous, Harentotou, 8 dr. with addition,;Esouris, son of Apynchis, 4 dr.,;Herakles alias Lykos, likewise, 8 dr., ;Ptomais, likewise, scribe, 24 dr.,;Papesneus, son of Kephalon, 16 dr.,;Pnepheros, son of Petosiris, son of Lakon, 16 dr.,;Harmiysis, son of Pnepheros, son of Lakon, 4 dr.,;100,;16, Keras, son of Harphaesis, son of Sambas, 44 dr.,;Petesouchos, son of Panetbyis, 44 dr. with addition,;88,;23, Akousilaos, son of Hermoitos, 36 dr.,;36."
